availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Marvel M. Logan (Edmonson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Edmonson County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Ellen "Nelly" Jones in Brownsville, Kentucky, on February 21, 1841. Father of Matilda Logan, G. F. Logan, G. W. Logan, Stanford J. Logan, Arabel Logan, Leard Logan, Elizabeth Logan, Garland B. Logan, and Allis H. Logan.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, p. 23A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, Brownsville, pp. 22-23.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Edmonson County Marriages, Film #001904232, p. 8.
